Articles.Content:
Hello pilots!

Currently I'm trying out a lot of VTOL ideas I have. Therefore I want some helicopter parts.

I already have KAX (adds rotors) and I'm aware of Firespitter.

Are there other mods?

I'm especially looking for rotors and fuselages.

Cya
I believe there was a parts pack that added onto B9 that had rotors. Can't remember it though.

@Fengist

I never heard of that mod before. Please try to remember! I beg you!

@Tontow

I know. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> ![Hdhut.blogspot.com+%2822%29.jpg](https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-cwo_-C6WpCU/UAkhoelZUMI/AAAAAAAAHnY/QMgGR9tpLBE/s1600/Hdhut.blogspot.com+%2822%29.jpg)

> ![Sikorsky-X2-Helicopter-1.jpeg](https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lX_Kcw3qRQ4/TbLd9mT0gfI/AAAAAAAAAks/b3li2cRnwls/s1600/Sikorsky-X2-Helicopter-1.jpeg)

> ![CH-46_Sea_Knight_Helicopter.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/49/CH-46_Sea_Knight_Helicopter.jpg)

Fengist is referring to [D12 Aerotech](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/77894-WIP-D12-Aerotech-A-B9-Aerospace-Expansion-%28Beta1%29)

not sure if it works on 1.0 though

> 
> Fengist is referring to [D12 Aerotech](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/77894-WIP-D12-Aerotech-A-B9-Aerospace-Expansion-%28Beta1%29)
> not sure if it works on 1.0 though

Thanks Buzz, that's the one.

And when you get one done, check the challenges forum. Search for HELO. I did an 'ultimate helo challenge' that'll put it through it's paces. It's a bit old but thinking of revamping it for 1.0

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-01T07:51:08Z" title="06/01/2015 07:51  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 1, 2015</time> by Fengist**

This is gold! Thanks to both of you! ![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)

There seems to some issues because the last official update was 1 year ago. I'll try to contact the mod author.

> 
> This is gold! Thanks to both of you! ![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)
> There seems to some issues because the last official update was 1 year ago. I'll try to contact the mod author.

NP. Fair warning though, KAS is not going to work as well as you expect with a Helo. I know I tried. You'll find you have a 'tiger by the tail.'

As for the square cross section, look at [Lack Luster Labs (LLL)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24906-LLL-Lack-Luster-Labs-Dev-Thread-LLL-13-1-13DEC2014-SXT-19-07DEC2014-KSC-v3). One of my favorite mods. It was still getting updated to 1.0.3 but it mostly works.

i want electric one's to do this! 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XboXcI9GL0c?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
